actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to ensure that medicare beneficiaries have continued access under current contracts to managed health care by extending the medicare cost contract program for 3 years.
short_title: Medicare Managed Care Cost Contract Extension Act of 1999

summary.text: Medicare Managed Care Cost Contract Extension Act of 1999 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to extend for three years through December 31, 2005, the Medicare managed care reasonable cost contract program.

titles.title: Medicare Managed Care Cost Contract Extension Act of 1999

A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to ensure that medicare beneficiaries have continued access under current contracts to managed health care by extending the medicare cost contract program for 3 years.
